HUMAN SERVICES & VETERANS COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE MEETING
~ MINUTES ~
Wednesday, April 7, 2021

5:30 PM

Sullivan Chamber

The Human Services and Veterans Committee will conduct a public hearing to discuss plans for
reopening of after school programs and summer camp opportunities through the City of
Cambridge.
Attendee Name
